# Leader Expectations

1. Everyone should lead a session if possible.
1. Present a summary of the material.
  1. Assume that everyone has read it.
  1. Present what was interesting or not obvious.
  1. Not expected to be an expert in the material.
  1. No longer than 15 min.
1. Leader creates exercise for the group to do.
  1. Bulk of the work should be on hands-on excises.
  1. Leader prepares the solutions in advance.
  1. Check all work into GitHub.
